name: Water & Drought Crisis
description: The Colorado River crisis threatens Lake Mead and Southern Nevada's water supply. Susie Lee has expertise here as VP of the Colorado River Caucus.
player_position: Market-based water solutions, desalination investment, reduce federal regulations
opponent_position: Federal conservation programs, Colorado River compact enforcement, infrastructure spending

name: Housing Costs
description: Median home price at $489K with rapid appreciation pricing out working families. Steve's real estate background is both an asset and liability.

opponent_position: Affordable housing programs, rent stabilization, federal housing vouchers

name: Economy & Cost of Living

name: Immigration

name: Healthcare

name: Education
